review: I have taken appointment for orthopedic concern and I had visited the hospital. Doctor was good and he had done my check up after that treatment was given to me. There was no wait time for me as my appointment was on time. I am overall 98% satisfied with this doctor and his treatment. Hospital staff were cooperative and responsive with me. I would like to recommend this doctor for my friends and family members also..

I consulted the doctor for my knee issue the doctor told that  I need to do operation so we decided we will do the operation everything went ok until & unless the bill came out the doctor charged us double telling we are charging for 2 operation while they said it is only 1 operation I was very upset hearing that they did not inform me about this before so we decided to visit another hospital

**** *** ****** ******** ********* ** ********* First I had a small tear which he advised me to not get a surgery for, then the shoulder kept getting worse leading to bone damage , used to pain a lot so went to him again , hes like' no no more scans required ,  ive seen your scan , your shoulder is fine. ' . Finally went to ganga hospital south india as the orthopedic scene in calcutta is really bad, they diognised theres a large tear along with boneloss and performed a surgery ***** ** ******** ********* ************ *** * ****** ** ******** **** ***** ** *** **** ***** *** **** *** ***** ** ** *** *** ** *********

I have taken appointment for orthopedic concern and I have visited the hospital. ****** *** ***** **** *** he had done my check up, after the check up he had provided the treatment to continue for 2 months and I can see some positive response in the treatment after taking that. AMRI hospital staff were cooperative and responsive with me.
Good experience, doctor is friendly, he has listened with patience & explained treatment options elaborately

My brother had met with an accident so we had booked appointment with this doctor for orthopedic surgery and we have visited the hospital. Doctor was really very good I can say that he was excellent. He had done the surgery *** ***** **** ** ******** *** **** ********* *** we are 100% satisfied with it. Hospital staff and management were very cooperative and responsive with us so it can rate for this 5 out 5. There was no wait time for us as our appointment was on time. I would like to recommend this doctor for my friends and family members also, so that it will be useful for other them to.

I have taken appointment for orthopedic concern and I have been to hospital. Dr. Rajib Basu is very nice doctor and I knew him from long back and he is one of our family doctor. My appointment was on time and there was no waiting time for me. Hospital staff were very cooperative and responsive with me. Overall I can rate this doctor 5 out of 5 star.

I have taken appointment for my son for knees surgery concern and visited the hospital. I would like to say that it was my biggest mistake that I have taken the appointment. I am one-off government employee from government I was getting the paid from my office and Doctor had done the surgery and they had made 2 bills for that when I said to make one bill means hospital management has refused to do it, so I had to pay from my pocket. The doctor and management are not good.
